title: Alternative recommendation for Fedra Sans
content:
im in need of alternatives for fedra sans display 1. i love the delicate qualities of the font, but need something slightly thicker. Hairline seems too thin, while thin is too thick! so i'm looking for a new typeface altogether.

Any help appreciated.

[http://www.typotheque.com/fedra\_sans\_display](http://web.archive.org/web/20150221212143/http:/www.typotheque.com/fedra_sans_display "http://www.typotheque.com/fedra\_sans\_display")
author: vonslam

comments.content: [Taz III](http://web.archive.org/web/20150221212143/http:/www.lucasfonts.com/cgi-bin/loadframe/lucasfnt/taz3/taz3.html) from Luc(as) de Groot has 15 weights, including 5 (!) hairline weights. So I think you should be able to find exactly what you need there. And if you can't, contact Luc(as) (or, probably, Peter Bil'ak of Fedra Sans Display) and they could whip you up a custom weight (for a price).
